abstract: Northeast Utilities said on Monday that it has agreed to acquire NStar for $4.3 billion in stock, in a merger that will create one of the biggest power utility companies in the country.
snippet: Northeast Utilities said on Monday that it has agreed to acquire NStar for $4.3 billion in stock, in a merger that will create one of the biggest power utility companies in the country.
lead_paragraph: 6:59 p.m. | Updated By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED and THOMAS KAPLAN

headline.main: Northeast in $4.3 Billion Stock Deal for NStar
